name: Health Outcomes Sciences
tag_list: healthcare-it, medical, technology, medicine, evidence-based-medicine, healthcare, clinical-decision-support, decision-support
overview:
Health Outcomes Sciences through its software platform, ePRISM, provides an prospective assessment of patient risk thus allowing clinicians to select the best course of treatment with respect to outcomes and cost. Through relationships with third party content and research partners such as the American College of Cardiology, HOS is the leader in the emerging area of personalized healthcare and has proven its ability to improve clinical outcomes and financial performance in its client hospitals.

After several years of product development and initial deployment, HOS was commercialized in 2010 and has now crossed many of the chasms that stand between Healthcare IT companies and success.

Among them:

• HOS has validated its solution and approach and is generating revenue from a user base that includes some of the most prestigious Academic Medical Centers in the US along with Community Hospitals and large multi-hospital/multi-state systems where significant expansion capability exists. • HOS has deployed a stable software solution that has proven scalable and serves as a platform from which to launch additional clinical specialties (neurology, orthopedics, cancer etc.). • ePRISM has produced documented and published results including improvement in patient care and significant financial return. Most notably, a recent research effort showed a 45% reduction in bleeding among 9 hospitals where angioplasty was performed and ePRISM was utilized.
• ePRISM is fully integrated with large Electronic Medical Record vendors, thus leveraging existing investments and providing additional value. • HOS utilizes a direct sales methodology along with utilization of sales channels through third party relationships.
